welcome:
Hello👋! I'm Botinok🤖.
❗ You can use my functionality only if you know the secret code provided by my creator.
choose_for_tracking:
Please choose what you'd like to do:
❗ Category – Select a category to narrow down your search.
❗ Query – Type what you're searching for (e.g. 'puppy', 'bike', 'sofa').
❗ URL – Provide a filtered OLX link (city, price, condition, etc).
❗ TOP – Enable this if you want to receive promoted listings too.
❗ Start Tracking – Once you're ready, hit this to begin monitoring.
cat_enter_available_list:
Here's the list of available categories.
Send me the modified list with the ones you want to track!
cat_write_all_or_not: Do you want to save all categories to the database?
cat_no_available_list: Your list doesn't contain any valid categories.
cat_select: Click the category you want to select.
db_users_removed: All users have been removed from the database.
db_users_nofound: No users found in the database!
url_choose_filter_and_enter: Go to olx.ua, apply filters, and send me the resulting URL👇
password_enter: Enter the secret code or phrase in response to this message👇.
password_enter_confirm: If you're sure, enter it below👇:
command_wo_permission: You don't have permission to run this command.
request_nofound_try_change: No results found for your query. Try changing the category or search term.
please_wait: This may take a while, please wait...
